entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backport #63582 to net6.0 (ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER in PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister) #79959
  • `IOptions<RecordType>` with `services.Configure<RecordType>` throws #79958
  • Add support for customizing name-matching for all properties when using `ConfigurationBinder` #79957
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) #79955
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce System.Net.IPAddressRange #79946

Closed

  • IReadOnlySet<T> is not covariant #79954
  • TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider Decrypt lost data #79924
  • NativeAOT cannot create generic type even if it is rooted using rd.xml #79930
  • RVA static access causes access violation #4860
    Future
  • Optimizations for the XorShift algorithm #4617
    Future
  • Superfluous mov(s) opcodes around left shifting/vmovmskps #430
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Base64.Decode: fixed latent bug for invalid input that is less than a block-size #79952
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix condition in backport.yml to also trigger on schedule #79951
  • Remove null annotation from *HeaderValue.Parse methods #79950
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix the ARM's `double` register name displayed in JitDisasm/JitDump #79949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Rename RdXmlFile to _DirectivesFile #79926
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #79940
    area-System.Security
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
